title: Replit AI — AI Tool Review
description: Replit AI is a cloud IDE with built-in AI that can generate, run, and deploy full applications directly in the browser from natural language. Replit AI integrates AI assistance directly into Replit's cloud IDE, allowing users to build, run, and deploy applications from prompts. The AI Agent can take a description and autonomously build a working app. It supports 50+ languages and provides a complete development environment in the browser — no local setup needed. Highlights: Browser-based development + AI. 50+ language support. Instant deployment. AI Agent for autonomous building. Free tier available.
